caption: Kids can help stop the cardboard from blowing away, just don't let them make holes in it!

Judge us not by our work clothes please ðŸ˜Š

Shaking out the first seeds with the future husband.

About 2 weeks in we had plenty of sprouts, predominately on the North face of the mound (it runs East/West). We suspected that the South face was drying out too fast and added irrigation. We should have also added mulch to reduce evaporation.
